entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then periods of rain. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
